sentences.english: In Triple Saints' Hall, we talked about who's who of the 3 statues inside the hall.
sentences.chinese: 在三聖殿和驢友討論過裏面的三座雕像分別是誰。

sentences.english: Trip with other tourists:We rent a truck to get the destination. It is a good start.
sentences.chinese: 包車同行》和其他驢友結伴，一起包了輛貨車出發。

sentences.english: Why foreigners need to handle "the ratification of travel to Tibet"?
sentences.chinese: 異國報酬何需要管理“入藏驢友覈准函”？

sentences.english: We can march through only because you are leading the way ahead.
sentences.chinese: 有你在前面的披荊斬棘，纔有後面衆驢友的闊步前進。

sentences.english: I've decided not to be your travel companion this time.
sentences.chinese: 我已經決定不當你的驢友了。

sentences.english: Shizhu Peak is not new to travelers from Changsha.
sentences.chinese: 對於長沙的驢友，石柱峯區域並不陌生。

definition: to go with sb/to form companionships
Lhasa, capital city of Tibet autonomous region 西藏自治區|西藏自治区
to ride (in a vehicle)/to get a lift/to hitch-hike
Lijiang prefecture-level city in northwest Yunnan
to ride (a bicycle, horse, motorbike etc)/cycling/horseback riding/motorbike riding/a ride/CL:次[ci4]
to lead the way/to guide/to show the way/fig. to instruct
Gulangyu, scenic island off Xiamen 廈門|厦门[Xia4 men2]
to set off/to start (on a journey)
